sentences.en: By optimizing the culture conditions , the rate of adventitious bud induction , elongation and rooting reached to 100 % , 83 %, and 100 %, respectively.
sentences.cn: 采用优化的培养基培养,不定芽诱导率达到100%, 不定芽伸长率达83%, 生根率达到100%.在此基础上建立了保加利亚尖椒的子叶离体高效再生体系.

sentences.en: Eureka adventitious buds regeneration were investigated.
sentences.cn: Eureka不定芽再生的主要因素.

sentences.en: High frequent adventitious shoot formation , plant regeneration and micro - propagation were established in trailing petunia ( Petunia hybrida ) leaf.
sentences.cn: 以垂吊型矮牵牛叶片为材料,建立了垂吊型矮 牵牛 叶片高效不定芽发生 、 植株再生和微繁的技术体系.

sentences.en: If adventitious sounds are auscultated, have client cough.
sentences.cn: 如有附加音,嘱病人咳嗽.

sentences.en: If this assumption be admitted, of course a union of God with the world renders God completely finite, and degrades Him to the bare finite and adventitious congeries of existence.
sentences.cn: 如果承认这个假定，则上帝与世界合而为一，是不啻将上帝纯然有限化了，贬低成为一个仅属有限的存在之外在的复合体了。

sentences.en: It required more than 15 to induce the adventitious ro - ots.
sentences.cn: 栽培麦冬时不定根发生需要15以上的温度.

sentences.en: It required more than 15℃ to induce the adventitious ro - ots.
sentences.cn: 栽培麦冬时不定根发生需要15℃以上的温度.

sentences.en: It was then that the ecstasy and the dream began, in which emotion was the matter of the universe, and matter but an adventitious intrusion likely to hinder you from spinning where you wanted to spin.
sentences.cn: 到了那时候，狂欢和梦想也就开始了，在这种狂欢和梦想里，激情变成了宇宙的物质，而物质只不过是一种外来的插进来的东西，有可能妨碍你在想旋转的时候旋转起来。

sentences.en: Stem erect or floating, elongate, 5 - angled, nodes often with adventitious roots.
sentences.cn: 茎直立或漂浮, 拉长, 5具角, 节通常具不定根的.

sentences.en: The adventitious birth of our fourth child completely changed our plan.
sentences.cn: 第四个孩子偶然的出生，完全改变了我们的计画。

sentences.en: The adventitious root is triarch, and has the secondary structure.
sentences.cn: 不定根为三原型, 具次生结构.

sentences.en: The best example of this phenomenon is the formation of adventitious embryos in carrot tissue cultures.
sentences.cn: 这一现象最具说服力的事例为胡萝卜组织培养中得到的异位胚胎.

sentences.en: The conditions promote the multiple formation of adventitious buds and regenerated rootsproliferating colonies of cells.
sentences.cn: 环境促进滋生的细胞群落多次形成不定芽与再生根.

sentences.en: The results provide the cytological basis of promoting adventitious root formation after GL - reagent treatment.
sentences.cn: 该实验结果为了解GL生根剂促进不定根形成的原因提供了细胞学基础.

trans.tran_cn: 偶然的，外来的，<生>偶生的，后天的
